TEXT: This Bruxa spawn was killed, or so it thought. Now it endeavors to escape after a rude awakening NL A slave to sanguine hunger, this fae vampire seeks to fulfill its bloodlust to empower its journey up the spire.
NL The source of vitality before you is... overwhelming. You draw a sharp breath and LEAP at the Heart.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~spawn~ ~,~ ~and~ ~ASCEND."~
